title: feature
description: Update feature card system to intelligently render based on what content exists in each feature folder: Graphic only (display just image), Text/HTML only (display just text), Both (display graphic with text below)
design: Detection logic: Check if feature has children (images) and cm:content. Render accordingly: has-image+has-content (image top, text below), has-image only (full-height image card), has-content only (text-only card), neither (placeholder)
acceptance_criteria: Feature card component detects available content, graphic-only cards display full-height image, text-only cards display with styled background, cards with both show image+text
notes:
Implemented smart rendering logic:
- feature-card now detects content type (has-image, has-text, both, neither)
- feature-card-image-only: Full-height image (1200px) with optional title overlay
- feature-card-text-only: Text-focused card with gradient background
- feature-card-image-and-text: Standard layout (900px image + 300px text)
- All variants maintain same height (1200px) for consistent grid
- Hover effects and transitions on all card types
Ready for testing on homepage
